title: Maruti Suzuki's in-plant railway siding, India's first such project, inaugurated by PM Modi in Gujarat
description: Modi also inaugurated and laid the foundation stone of Rs 85,000 crore railway projects, including the launch of 10 new Vande Bharat trains, from Sabarmati area of Ahmedabad. He also visited the Dedicated Freight Corridor's (DFC) Operation Control Centre.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
